txt.en: Orcs can be found along the Forest River, between Felegoth and Loeglond.\n\nYou should defeat Orc ambushers and Orc hunters.

'I have received reports of Orcs coming down from the Green Mountains, disrupting trade along the Forest River, and attacking any who go to investigate. I doubt they will be any threat to someone as battle-hardened as you, [placeholder]. Would you please take care of these trouble-makers?'
Lorndúr can be found in Loeglond.\n\nYou should talk to Lorndúr.
Orcs from the Green Mountains have been disrupting trade and harassing the raft-elves. Lorndúr would like you to deal with these trouble-makers.
'Thank you, [placeholder]. Perhaps now that the war is over, these occurrences will be less frequent.'\n\nHe sighs. You think he is not convinced by his own words.
